name: Concatenate (Califronic)
description:
CONCATENATE

Help put away the yarn balls into the boxes. Push balls of yarn together to concatenate (combine) their number values into a single number. Be sure the yarn ball has the right number before putting it into the box! Fill up all the boxes to clear each level.

Conrols:
Move cat - WASD / Arrow Keys
Reset level - R
In-game menu - Esc

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2021 - Joined Together
